item.title: Custom detections are now the unified experience for creating detections in Microsoft Defender
item.description:
As we continue to deliver on our vision to simplify security workflows for the SOC, we are making custom detections the unified solution for building and managing rules over Defender XDR and Sentinel data. While analytics rules remain available, we recommend using custom detections for access to new features and enhancements. Benefits of unified custom detections Adopting custom detections as the primary method for rule management helps streamline operations and enhance security. You can refer to this page for a full list of the benefits. Some highlights include:
